channel.title: Environs on Sam Havron
channel.description: Recent content in Environs on Sam Havron

item.title: Environs
item.description: Some of the places that I like and recommend in New York, presented in no particular order (WIP). browse McNally Jackson Independent Booksellers. In Nolita (Manhattan), closest to Bowery , Broadway-Lafayette St , or Spring St . Zabar’s. On the Upper West Side (Manhattan), closest to 79 St or 81 St - Museum of Natural History . eat La Newyorkina. Mexican ice cream. In Greenwich Village (Manhattan), closest to West 4 St - Washington Sq .
